get.summary: Returns a list of Apache Airflow jobs from the specified workspace.
get.description:
This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).

## Permissions

 The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

Workspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: A token for retrieving the next page of results.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.

post.summary: Creates an Apache Airflow job in the specified workspace.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 To create Apache Airflow job with a public definition, refer to [](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/public-facing-name) article. 

 ## Permissions 
 The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 ApacheAirflowJob.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All 

## Limitations 
- To create an Apache Airflow job the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid

* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used.

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.

get.summary: Returns properties of the specified Apache Airflow job.
get.description:
## Permissions

 The caller must have *read* permissions for the apache airflow job. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 ApacheAirflowJob.Read.All or ApacheAirflowJob.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

default.description:
Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.

patch.summary: Updates the properties of the specified Apache Airflow job.
patch.description:
## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the apache airflow job.

## Required Delegated Scopes

 ApacheAirflowJob.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: updateApacheAirflowJobRequest
parameters.description: Update Apache Airflow job request payload.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found. 

* InvalidRequest - Invalid update request.

delete.summary: Deletes the specified Apache Airflow job.
delete.description:
## Permissions

 The caller must have *write* permissions for the apache airflow job. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 ApacheAirflowJob.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Interface

Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.

post.summary: Returns the specified Apache Airflow job public definition.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

When you get a 's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.

## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the apache airflow job. 

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the public definition.

202.description: Request accepted. Retrieving the definition is in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item.

post.summary: Overrides the definition for the specified Apache Airflow job.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 
Updating the 's definition, does not affect its sensitivity label. 

## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the apache airflow job. 
## Required Delegated Scopes

 ApacheAirflowJob.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: updateMetadata
parameters.description: When set to true and the .platform file is provided as part of the definition, the item's metadata is updated using the metadata in the .platform file

parameters.name: updateApacheAirflowJobDefinitionRequest
parameters.description: Update Apache Airflow job definition request payload.

202.description: Request accepted. Update definition is in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item. 

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.
